description: small black oblong breast cover; red, blue, green and light gold embroidered vertical geometric patterned stripes at either side; side edges with white beads and green fringe; bottom and top edges with short beads; longer beads at top and bottom of embroidered sections; center seam with red threads and small white beads; V shaped design of beads in center of striped sections; raised vertical lines in fabric
title: Breast cover
